Posted By: Bob Donaldson
Hi,

I've the following in VG or so condition looking to trade for hits to my pre war wantlist.  Trades only at this time.

Thanks for looking!

Bob

MY PREWAR WANTLIST

T205 Adkins, Archer, Bailey, Ball, Barger (partial "B" on cap), Bell, Birmingham, Bransfield, Bresnahan (mouth closed), Brown, Chase (only left ear shows ), Collins mouth open,Jimmy Collins, Criger, Dahlen, Daubert, Devlin, Devore, Donohue, Downey, Dunn, Egan,, Ferguson, Fletcher,Flynn, Gardner, Gibson, Graham (Cubs), Grant,Griffith, Hanford, Harmon (both ears show), Harmon (only left ear shows), Hummel, Jennings, Johnson, Jones, Joss, Karger, Killian, Lathom, Lennox, Livingston, Lobert, Magee, Marquard, Mathewson, McElveen, McIntire (Cubs), McIntire (White Sox), McLean, Merritt, Moriarty, Mullin, O'Leary, Overall, Parent, Payne, Phelan, Raymond, Reulbach, Rowan, Rucker, Scanlan, Scott, Shean (Cubs), Simmons, Stanage, Stovall, Street, Suggs, Summers, Vaughn, White (Whie Sox), White (Pirates),Wilhelm,Willett, Wiltse (left ear hidden),Cy Young
T205 Upgrades to F/G (readable back, no missing paper, no holes) Dickson, Duffy, Ewing, Olmstead, Tannehill, Thomas, Wagner, Walsh


T202 Triple Folders NEW SET – I have; Before the Battle, Birmingham Goess to Third, Chance Beats Out a Hit, Cree Rolls Home, Donlin out at First , The Athletic Infield, The Scissors Slide, Moriarity Spiked, A Wide Throw Saves Crawford, Too Late fofr Devlin, . Need the rest!
